job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software development tasks: building, deploying, and maintaining backend solutions, emphasizing scalability and security, which aligns with the definition of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building APIs for integration is a core software engineering task focused on connecting different system components, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on solution design using established software design principles (SOLID, MVC) is a fundamental aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met Azure voor deployment, resource management en schaalbaarheid.
job_tasks.justification: Utilizing cloud services like Azure for deployment and resource management is a key part of the operational side of software development, aligning with the broader scope of Operations & MLOps (LLMOps) even if not strictly ML-specific.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to CI/CD processes and version control (GitHub) are core MLOps/DevOps practices essential for software deployment and maintenance, fitting the Operations & MLOps (LLMOps) category.

job_tasks.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Supporting cross-functional teams in integrating backend services within a microservice architecture is a clear example of software integration and development.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'Samenwerken' (collaboration) with other developers and architects, which falls under the Communication & Collaboration category.

soft_skills.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
soft_skills.justification: Supporting cross-functional teams implies collaboration and communication to achieve integration goals, fitting the Communication & Collaboration category.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional back-end software development tasks, including API development, integration, adherence to software design principles (SOLID, MVC), CI/CD, and cloud deployment. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific model development or specialization. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing entirely on traditional software engineering practices and technologies. There are no ambiguous terms or mentions of AI/ML that would suggest a different profile. The tasks and technologies listed align perfectly with the definition of a 'Software Engineer' profile.
